## Import Data (Placeholder)

```{r import-data}
dat <- tibble(
  id = 1:10,
  x  = rnorm(10),
  y  = rnorm(10)
)
```

# Descriptive Analysis

## Summary Table

```{r summary}
summary(dat)
```

# Model (Placeholder)

## Linear Regression

```{r regression}
m1 <- lm(y ~ x, data = dat)
summary(m1)
```

## Extract Coefficients

```{r coefficients}
coef(m1)
confint(m1)
```

# Robustness / Extensions (Placeholder)

```{r robustness}

summary(m2)
```
